game.name: DCS: F-4E Red Flag 81-2 Campaign by Reflected Simulations
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Tracked Controller Support, VR Support, Partial Controller Support
game.shortDescription: During the Vietnam War the United States Air Force discovered that their pilots’ survival rates improved significantly once they completed their first ten combat missions.
game.shortDescriptionEn: During the Vietnam War the United States Air Force discovered that their pilots’ survival rates improved significantly once they completed their first ten combat missions.
